document_data.name: Holy Order of the Most Skilled Architects and Bridgemakers
document_data.orgname: the Holy Order of the Most Skilled Architects and Bridgemakers
document_data.mainbody: The '''Holy Order of the Most Skilled Architects and Bridgemakers''' was an honorary order whose members were devoted to [[Gond]], the [[Wonderbringer]].<ref name="FaA-p63" >
document_data.Organization: Members of this organization were skilled architects and craftsmen who praised Gond through their work on designing and constructing buildings and bridges.
